item.title: MIPS Mini CPU - 5 Stage Pipeline in Verilog
item.description: As a conclusion to my computer organization course, our final project was to implement a five stage pipeline constructed in Verilog over an FPGA partially implementing the MIPS instruction set. Abstract The following details the development of a five stage pipeline constructed on Xilinx’s Vivado in Verilog over an FPGA partially implementing the MIPS instruction set. In its current configuration, it supports only basic R-Format instructions like add, sub, and, or, etc.
